name: Bust of Ottavio Farnese (1542 - 1586)
description: Bust of Ottavio Farnese (1542 - 1586); Attributed to Francesco Mochi (Italian, 1580 - 1654); Parma (possibly), Italy; late 16th century; Marble; 68.6 × 63.5 × 22.9 cm (27 × 25 × 9 in.); 87.SA.36; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Bust of Ottavio Farnese (1542 - 1586)
